Package net.kemitix.mon.lazy

Interface Lazy<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the value
All Superinterfaces:
Functor<T,​Lazy<?>>
public interface Lazy<T> extends Functor<T,​Lazy<?>>
Lazy evaluation of 'expensive' expressions.
Author:
Paul Campbell (pcampbell@kemitix.net)
